reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Developing entrepreneurship among young people in Belarus

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to develop entrepreneurship among young people (22-35 years old) in Minsk with involvement to the creation of business projects. The plan consists of preparing and implementing Business Forum and two Business courses + the F inal event. The Business Forum will be realized in the form of 2 days summer camp for 200 participants during which business trainings and networking and round tables will be organized. The aim is to create a youth entrepreneurship community which will hel p each other exchange experience and discuss the problems. On the basis of the forum at least 15 most motivated persons ready to develop their business projects will be selected to participate Business Courses. First round of Business Course will focus on going from business idea to working prototype under supervision of experienced entrepreneurs owners shareholders. Participants of the course will develop a product or prototype implement individual action plans and form a team. The aim is to form 8 session s (4 hours each) in one round of business course with 30 participants in each session. On the basis of the experience on first round of Business course the second course for a new group will be organized. The final presentation event will be held in Minsk and will show the results of the project in publicity. The experience (feedback lessons learned recommendations) how to support youth entrepreneurship will be delivered also to relevant authorities (Ministries of Economy and Education).
